max_retries.description: Maximum number of retries for Site24x7 API errors until giving up

retry_max_wait.description: Maximum wait time in seconds before retrying failed API requests (exponential backoff).

retry_min_wait.description: Minimum wait time in seconds before retrying failed API requests.

user_group_ids.description: List of user groups to be notified when the monitor is down.

dependency_resource_id.description: List of dependent resource IDs. Suppress alert when dependent monitor(s) is down.

display_name.description: Display Name for the Monitor Group.

health_threshold_count.description: Number of monitors' health that decide the group status. ‘0’ implies that all the monitors are considered for determining the group status. Default value is 1.

suppress_alert.description: Boolean value indicating whether to suppress alert when the dependent monitor is down. Setting suppress_alert = true with an empty dependency_resource_id is meaningless.

location_profile_id.description: Location profile to be associated with the monitor.

location_profile_name.description: Name of the location profile to be associated with the monitor.

monitor_groups.description: List of monitor groups to which the monitor has to be associated.

notification_profile_id.description: Notification profile to be associated with the monitor.

threshold_profile_id.description: Threshold profile to be associated with the monitor.

user_group_ids.description: List of user groups to be notified when the monitor is down.

domain_name.description: Domain name to be verified for SSL Certificate.

expire_days.description: Day threshold for certificate expiry notification. Range 1 - 999.

ignore_domain_mismatch.description: Boolean to ignore domain name mismatch errors.

ignore_trust.description: To ignore the validation of SSL/TLS certificate chain.

location_profile_id.description: Location profile to be associated with the monitor.

location_profile_name.description: Name of the location profile to be associated with the monitor.

monitor_groups.description: List of monitor groups to which the monitor has to be associated.

notification_profile_id.description: Notification profile to be associated with the monitor.

protocol.description: Supported protocols are HTTPS, SMTPS, POPS, IMAPS, FTPS or CUSTOM

threshold_profile_id.description: Threshold profile to be associated with the monitor.

timeout.description: Timeout for connecting to the host. Range 1 - 45.

user_group_ids.description: List of user groups to be notified when the monitor is down.

down_location_threshold.description: Triggers alert when the monitor is down from configured number of locations.

profile_name.description: Display Name for the threshold profile

type.description: Type of the monitor for which the threshold profile is being created.

website_content_modified.description: Triggers alert when the website content is modified.

auth_method.description: Authentication method to access the action url.

custom_parameters.description: Mandatory, if send_custom_parameters is set as true. Custom parameters to be passed while accessing the action url.

method.description: HTTP Method to access the action url.

send_custom_parameters.description: Configuration to send custom parameters while executing the action.

send_email.description: Boolean indicating whether to send email or not.

send_in_json_format.description: Optional, use only if HTTP Method chosen is GET. Configuration to enable json format for post parameters.

send_incident_parameters.description: Configuration to send incident parameters while executing the action.

url.description: URL to be invoked for action execution.

user_agent.description: User Agent to be used while monitoring the website.

attribute_group_id.description: Attribute Alert Group to be associated with the User Alert group.

display_name.description: Display name for the user group.

product_id.description: Product for which the user group is being created. Default value is 0.

users.description: User IDs of the users to be associated to the group.

actions.description: Action to be performed on monitor status changes.

auth_pass.description: Authentication password to access the website.

auth_user.description: Authentication user name to access the website.

check_frequency.description: Interval at which your website has to be monitored. Default value is 1 minute.

custom_headers.description: Header name and value in a string array.

http_method.description: HTTP Method to be used for accessing the website. PUT, PATCH and DELETE are not supported

location_profile_id.description: Location profile to be associated with the monitor.

location_profile_name.description: Name of the location profile to be associated with the monitor.

match_case.description: Perform case sensitive keyword search or not.

match_regex_severity.description: Severity with which alert has to raised when the matching regex is found in the website response.

match_regex_value.description: Match the regular expression in the website response.

matching_keyword_severity.description: Severity with which alert has to raised when the matching keyword is found in the website response.

monitor_groups.description: List of monitor groups to which the monitor has to be associated.

notification_profile_id.description: Notification profile to be associated with the monitor.

threshold_profile_id.description: Threshold profile to be associated with the monitor.

timeout.description: Timeout for connecting to website. Default value is 10. Range 1 - 45.

unmatching_keyword_severity.description: Severity with which alert has to raised when the keyword is not present in the website response.

up_status_codes.description: Provide a comma-separated list of HTTP status codes that indicate a successful response. You can specify individual status codes, as well as ranges separated with a colon.

use_name_server.description: Resolve the IP address using Domain Name Server.

user_agent.description: User Agent to be used while monitoring the website.

user_group_ids.description: List of user groups to be notified when the monitor is down.
